name: bike-voucher
effect: May be traded for a bicycle.
short_effect: Trade in Cerulean bike shop for a Bicycle.

flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A voucher for
obtaining a bicycle
from the BIKE SHOP.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
Take this voucher to the BIKE SHOP
in CERULEAN CITY and exchange it
for a bicycle.
